title: january 20: a campaign to remember (with ella jane)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Barack Obama being inaugurated as the first Black president, and what it took to get him there. Then, Maia talks about an important music and food collaboration: the introduction of Phish Food ice cream. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
